DOC.HEADLINE: WEST VENTURA COUNTY FOCUS : VENTURA ; CITY OFFERS $ 60 # 000 IN GRANTS FOR THE ARTS
DOC.TEXT: Artists , arts organizations , social_service groups and educators may apply to the city of Ventura for four grants offered this year through the city ' s Office of Cultural Affairs . There is $ 15 # 000 available for fellowships to individual artists . An additional $ 25 # 000 is available to arts organizations for the production and presentation of cultural or artistic works for the public . The city is also offering $ 11 # 000 in grants for outreach efforts that make the arts more accessible to such underserved populations as senior_citizens , poor neighborhoods and disabled people . Projects may be sponsored by arts organizations or social_service groups working with arts organizations or artists . There is also $ 9 # 000 available for projects that bring professional artists into contact with_children and adolescents . These projects can be sponsored by schools , community groups or arts organizations and should take_place in the school setting . Applications for the grants must be submitted by 5 p.m. June 15 . Two workshops explaining how to apply for the grants are free . The first will be Thursday and the second June 8 . Both will be from 6 to 7:30 p.m. in Ventura City_Hall Conference_Room E , 501 Poli St . For information , call 658-4783 . CONSTANCE SOMMER
